programme.title: The Bridge
programme.desc: A body is left on the border of Singapore and Malaysia. Two investigators, one from each country, must work together to catch a killer bent on highlighting social problems that they think are plaguing people on both sides of the border.

programme.title: Champions Of The Water
programme.desc: Behind the scenes series of the World's First All-Electric Raceboat Championship, featuring stories around the event, the pilots, teams, the city and the racing action.

programme.title: Crime Scene Kitchen S2
programme.desc: Bakers try to guess what type of dessert is made in the kitchen by looking at the leftover crumbs, flour trails, and other clues. Later, the bakers recreate the menu.

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S41
programme.desc: Pat Sajak hosts his final season of Wheel of Fortune.

programme.title: Top 100 Weather Moments
programme.desc: Weather affects us all every single day, what we wear, what we eat, how we do our jobs, even how we feel. Wars have been won or lost, inventions devised and history shaped all because of the weather. This series counts down the top 100 weather moments, the biggest storms and the most iconic, memorable weather events in history.

programme.title: Britain's Got Talent S15
programme.desc: In order to win the title, the people of Britain showcase their talent ranging from mundane to the most extraordinary acts that are seemingly impossible. Season 15 returns with Judges Actress Amanda Holden, singer Alesha Dixon, comedian David Walliams and show creator Simon Cowell, together with Hosts Ant and Dec.

programme.title: Deal Or No Deal Australia S12
programme.desc: The exhilarating hit game show where contestants must beat The Banker to win a huge cash prize, is making a triumphant return. The ultimate contest of nerve, luck and pure gut instinct will be fronted by one of Australia's most beloved TV presenters, Gold Logie winner Grant Denyer.

programme.title: Hiccup And Sneeze S2
programme.desc: Hiccup and Sneeze spot a rare Fifo bug outside the window, but Bibi misses it. To surprise her, they come up with different plans to try to catch it.

programme.title: Club M.A.G.I.C Sr 3
programme.desc: CLUB M.A.G.I.C - the first, locally produced preschool series on OKTO returns for a third season with fresh new ideas for a positively fun learning experience! An original concept developed for preschoolers.

programme.title: Watch Eat! S3
programme.desc: Work those eyes and exercise those neck muscles, Watch Eat! is off to the supermarket this week! Join Einstein Kristiansen of Cows & Crayons as he goes in search of the essential natural health ingredient - Vegetables! And how we can make vegetables tasty and fun as part of our daily diet.

programme.title: Pororo the Little Penguin 3
programme.desc: Join Pororo and friends in their fun adventures!

programme.title: Lil Wild Shorts S2
programme.desc: Your favourite animal friends are back to learn, dance and sing together! Join Wobi as he tackles questions sent in from kids around the world like, "Why does Tina the flamingo stand on one leg?" or "How loudly can Kofi the lion ROAR?". After that, kick back with some cool tunes with the gang.

programme.title: Ok-to Try
programme.desc: Have you thought about creating a pizza with only your favourite toppings? In this episode, our Try-ers get creative with their choice of ingredients on a pizza.

programme.title: Cosmicrew S1
programme.desc: Meet the cosmic rangers - courageous team leader Storm the tiger, fun-loving man of action Flash the monkey and science genius Rainbow the rabbit! From the Cosmicrew Base - their headquarters on Earth - the cosmic rangers launch into mission after mission, helping animals across the globe using not only their high-tech Cosmicrew gear, but also their own strength, courage and smarts. Every exciting encounter helps Storm, Flash and Rainbow discover the amazing abilities each animal possesses.

programme.title: Slimed Science

programme.title: Slimed Science
programme.desc: Dr Slime has been tasked to prepare for a birthday party, and he needs to hurry! Can he make a cake without an oven, and pump up the balloons quickly enough for the party?

programme.title: Transformers Earthspark S1
programme.desc: A new species of Transformers must find their place and purpose among Autobots, Decepticons, and the human family who adopts them.

programme.title: Totally Spies S3
programme.desc: Three teenage girls from Beverly Hills attempt to balance their lives as high school (later university) students with their undercover work as super-spies, battling an array of bizarre criminals!

programme.title: Ultraman Arc
programme.desc: (Dual Language - English and Mandarin) The story is about Arc protecting the future of the Earth and mankind from looming threats. Yuma transforms into Ultraman Arc by inserting the Arc Cube, which contains the power of the being of light, into the mystic Arc Ariser and unleashing his power.

programme.title: Super Wings The Movie
programme.desc: The transforming airplane Super Wings travel around the world to deliver packages to kids and to help solve problems creatively.

programme.title: Films & Stars
programme.desc: Films and Stars cover the hottest events from the big screen every week.

programme.title: Hungry For It
programme.desc: Ten amateur chefs embark on the ultimate crash course in their bid to break into the restaurant business and win the culinary trip of a lifetime. At the end of the series, the winning cook enjoys a round-the-world trip working in some of the industry's most renowned restaurants. The cooks' mentors are grime artist and TV cook Big Zuu, and Kayla Greer, a private chef from LA whose clients includes the singer Justin Bieber.

programme.title: Stars In Style S8
programme.desc: Stars in Style cover all the important looks and shapes from the biggest celebs. The hottest trends in fashion, beauty and lifestyle with expert tips and opinions.

programme.title: Chingay 2025 - Joy
programme.desc: Experience the vibrant Chingay Parade! Featuring a breathtaking performance by 60 lion dancers and multi-ethnic drummers on a spectacular four-level stage, celebrating Singapore's rich cultural heritage, artistic talent, and collective spirit. With the theme "JOY", the parade captivating audiences with an all-new immersive showcase that culminates in a magnificent "SG60 CELEBRATION".

programme.title: Shazam! Fury of the Gods
programme.desc: The film continues the story of teenage Billy Batson who, upon reciting the magic word "SHAZAM!" is transformed into his adult Super Hero alter ego, Shazam.

programme.title: News Tonight
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: I Can See Your Voice Singapore
programme.desc: Celebrity detectives Gurmit Singh, Najip Ali, Xixi Lim and guest detectives Jernelle Oh and Seow Sin Nee, help celebrity contestants HST - Herman Keh, Zhai Siming and Tylen Ten, separate the good singers from the bad.

programme.title: The Earthshot Prize: Repairing of Our Planet
programme.desc: An ambitious and important series focused around the Earthshot initiative to save our increasingly fragile planet. This is a critical decade for Earth. Facing up to the urgent need to fix our climate, restore nature and build a waste-free world can feel overwhelming.

programme.title: Frozen Planet II
programme.desc: Our frozen planet is changing. In this final episode, we meet the scientists and people dedicating their lives to understanding what these changes mean, not just for the animals and people who live there, but for the world as a whole. Our journey begins in the Arctic, where every summer huge quantities of ice calve from the edges of Greenland's melting glaciers.

programme.title: Hoarders S12
programme.desc: To be part of his unborn granddaughter's life, Cobra must clean up his hoarded house and turn his 37-acre property into a safer environment. The Hoarders team of experts really have their hands full with a completely unsanitary and unstable house, a trailer home, multiple ruined cars, and ultimately Cobra's stubborn attitude about getting rid of junk.

programme.title: The Wall UK S4
programme.desc: The Wall is a wildly unpredictable, fast and simple game show with huge cash sums on the line. Two players must work together to tackle the mammoth four-storey-high wall. Emotions run high as the pair's faith in one another is tested by unpredictable outcomes and ever-rising stakes. The rules are simple. If the players answer a trivia question correctly, the ball turns green as it falls randomly down the wall towards slots of varying cash amounts.

programme.title: Pokemon Journeys: The Series
programme.desc: Pokemon Trainer Ash Ketchum has a new plan: see the world! But first, he and his partner Pikachu are headed to the opening of the Cerise Laboratory, a research facility dedicated to uncovering the mysteries of Pokemon in every region. Ash meets Goh, another boy with boundless curiosity about Pokemon, and both are overjoyed when Professor Cerise asks them to become official research fellows.

programme.title: Talking Point
programme.desc: An advertising code of conduct for the tuition industry is in the works to rein in marketing that guilt trips parents and creates a fear of missing out. But are agencies to blame? Or is this the result of unfettered demand by parents who simply want the best for their kids? Join Diana Ser in a special 1-hr LIVE forum to find out if our obsession with tuition is getting out of control.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Meals For Every Day
programme.desc: Join Jamie at home with his family in Essex for delicious, family-focused food for real life, every day In this brand new series, we join the nation's favourite chef at his country home, where he's cooking up tasty, healthy recipes from his new book 7 Ways: Easy Ideas for Every Day of the Week. Inspired by his own home cooking, based around simple, crowd-pleasing family meals that are creative but pressure-free, Jamie mostly uses 8 ingredients or less, with plenty of versatility.

programme.title: The Chefs' Line S2
programme.desc: Every top restaurant has a line of chefs leading to the top, from the Commis chef to the Head chef. This celebratory cooking competition pitches at-home cooking enthusiasts against professionals, starting at the bottom and working their way up. Can they beat their way to the top of The Chef's Line?

programme.title: MasterChef Australia S12
programme.desc: Top Australian chefs judge passionate home cooks who participate in competitive culinary challenges to develop their cooking skills and win the title of the best chef. This series involves former high-achieving contestants from the past eleven series of MasterChef Australia, returning for another chance at the title of 'MasterChef' and a prize of A$250,000.

programme.desc: (PG) 常常入眠困难，难得进入梦乡却被鬼压床，搞得精神涣散怎么办？养生出大招，赶走鬼怪有妙招！医师带来珍贵的安神秘方-桂圆红枣鸡蛋汤，睡前喝一碗就能宁静安神，稳稳入梦乡！ 节目组走出棚内，深入槟岛寻找古代的安神宝物，制香师亲身示范如何正确品香，靠这招就能调和身心，安心入眠。 养生当然少不了练练招，睡前两手搓热再打开闭合，就能调动副交感神经，放松神经睡得好，师傅在节目里也会介绍一个“神穴位”，只要按摩这个穴位，就能清心火，更容易入睡养心神！最后轮到厨师美味登场，端出药食两用的鲜百合，鲜百合清心安神，再加上健脾胃的栗子和咸香虾米，把所有的美味和安神功效全融进一锅炊饭里，清甜爽脆的口感，也特别适合老人家吞咽，人人吃了饱腹又安神！.

programme.title: 藏着的武林
programme.desc: (PG)《藏着的武林》摄制组开始了历时三年，行程数万公里的寻访。回归常识，冷静、理性、科学地解读中国传统武术的历史源流和真实面目。为观众解密一个藏于民间，却鲜为外人所知的中国传统武术世界。他们依旧有着自己的传承方式和关于中国功夫的秘密。带着一系列的疑问，立足当下，回望历史，展望未来。.

programme.title: 非一般婚礼
programme.desc: 结婚对台湾原住民——排湾族来说，是一件神圣的事，牵涉个人阶级地位和家族名誉，讲求门当户对。这一次，Emily见证了一场贵族联姻，不仅见识到排湾族头目，婚礼的隆重和华丽，还体验了贵族婚礼独有的荡秋千仪式，化身最强亲友团，帮忙张罗聘礼、制作小米糕和花环。婚礼当天，宛如吵架的下聘礼和藏婚仪式更叫Emily惊心动魄，震撼不断.

programme.desc: 《冀味儿》是首部聚焦燕赵美食的文化纪录片，也是主创团队镜头向下，用平民视角和故事手法聚焦乡野达人，还原美食背后技艺与传承、性格与情感的致敬之作。透过氤氲的美食香气，观众闻得到乡土气息，听得见朴素乡音，窥得着精神气质，品得出淡淡乡愁。乡村、家常、草根、一日三餐。整季地域范围跨度大，重点打造两纵两横美食文化线，滹沱河与燕山横亘东西，太行山并大运河纵横南北，经纬度定位清晰，勾勒出一城一味的燕赵风情。.

programme.title: 《伟人不见了！》
programme.desc: (PG) Max想看电影，但是却遇到重重阻碍，原来是"现代电影之父”卢米埃尔兄弟不见了！Max和Anaka先去拜访亚洲电影资料馆，了解早年胶片电影的资讯。Max找到了弟弟路易之后，便带他去了解现代电影技术—虚拟制作的过程。Max能找到哥哥奥古斯特吗？他能让两兄弟一起回到书中吗？.

programme.title: 华文"浆"好玩之时空旅程

programme.title: 小团剧

programme.title: 别样人生
programme.desc: 营销顾问Firdaus Sani是第四代海人，祖父母来自实马高，是70年代被迁移到本岛的居民之一。他创建网站分享其祖先与族群的历史故事，同时提供海人料理订购服务，将故乡的味道分享给更多人。平面设计师冯鸿明出身潮剧演员家庭，童年记忆都与潮剧团有关。即便长大成人后，他也不曾想过放弃这个传统艺术。.

programme.title: 糖朝冠冕

programme.desc: 《冀味儿》是首部聚焦燕赵美食的文化纪录片，也是主创团队镜头向下，用平民视角和故事手法聚焦乡野达人，还原美食背后技艺与传承、性格与情感的致敬之作。透过氤氲的美食香气，观众闻得到乡土气息，听得见朴素乡音，窥得着精神气质，品得出淡淡乡愁。乡村、家常、草根、一日三餐。整季地域范围跨度大，重点打造两纵两横美食文化线，滹沱河与燕山横亘东西，太行山并大运河纵横南北，经纬度定位清晰，勾勒出一城一味的燕赵风情。.

programme.title: 藏着的武林
programme.desc: (PG)《藏着的武林》摄制组开始了历时三年，行程数万公里的寻访。回归常识，冷静、理性、科学地解读中国传统武术的历史源流和真实面目。为观众解密一个藏于民间，却鲜为外人所知的中国传统武术世界。他们依旧有着自己的传承方式和关于中国功夫的秘密。带着一系列的疑问，立足当下，回望历史，展望未来。.

programme.title: 小娘惹
programme.desc: (PG) 故事从30年代展开，横跨70年至现今。黄菊香生于海峡华人（峇峇娘惹）的大家庭，是出生卑微的小姨太之女。大时代的动荡，让菊香饱受折磨，她的丈夫死了，她也死了，留下年纪仅8岁的月娘。二战结束后，逃难到英国的外祖父携家眷回到马来亚，月娘就像当年的母亲一样，被歧视、毒打、折磨，她为了保护外婆，忍辱负重，承受一切的痛苦。月娘被卖给杀猪贩刘一刀当妻子。月娘不甘心自己的一生交由其他人摆弄，宁可结束自己的生命。她刚烈的个性，让刘一刀敬佩，与她结拜为兄妹。月娘决定寻找自己的一条出路，她开始学习做生意，过程中，她被劣人陷害、被驱逐、被打击，但她都一一挺过来，最后重振已衰败的家族生意。.

programme.title: 余生正好
programme.desc: (PG-部分画面令人不安) 48岁的朱月虹即将参加自己的生前丧礼。在人生划上句点之前，朱月虹要和身边的朋友好好道别。帮助她实现这个愿望的，是医疗社工沈慧珊。在生命倒数的时光中，慈怀医疗社工帮助临终病患充实、安详地走完人生最后一程。原本准备为96岁的Kamala女士完成小小心愿，医疗社工郑嘉森却在筹备的当儿收到突如其来的消息。.
